task.summary: First Attempt for adaboost, something wrong
Fixed bug in code, using np.exp to caculate ln is not correct!!!
Added prediction on test in each iteration.
Rewrote roc and auc algorithm and apply them into adaboost
Implemented a random predictor with adaboost
Running adaboost on crx and vote dataset. Implemented a encoder to encode string value to numeric value Implemented a imputer to fill missing value
Running adaboost on crx and vote dataset. Implemented a encoder to encode string value to numeric value Implemented a imputer to fill missing value
Added support to random select train data
First try on ecoc, serious performance issue
First try on ecoc, improve the performance a little bit.
